EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-02-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Container Service Goes GA and 30 Years of Tech Transitions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FEBRUARY 15, 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/secure-multitenant-kubernetes-in-minutes-pivotal-container-service-goes-ga?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Container Service Goes GA Pivotal Container Service is now generally available, learn what makes PKS a complete solution for production Kubernetes workloads. Secure, Multitenant K8s in Minutes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/secure-multitenant-kubernetes-in-minutes-pivotal-container-service-goes-ga?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/30-years-of-tech-transitions-f4ed42ec464c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> 30 Years of Tech Transitions Pivotal CEO Rob Mee and Michael Dell, CEO of Dell Technologies talk to Michal Lev-Ram, Senior Writer at Fortune, about the last thirty years of tech and what’s in store for the next thirty. Watch Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/30-years-of-tech-transitions-f4ed42ec464c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-flexible-data-pipelines-with-spring-cloud-data-flow-for-pcf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Building Flexible Data Pipelines with Spring Cloud Data Flow for PCF Meet Spring Cloud Data Flow for PCF. Build modern pipelines for data-driven apps & event processing. PCF ❤️'s Spring <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-flexible-data-pipelines-with-spring-cloud-data-flow-for-pcf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://youtu.be/QOSu5QqB0is]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/introducing-mysql-for-pcf-v2-2-leader-follower-clusters-offer-enhanced-availability?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Introducing MySQL for PCF v2.2 Check out how MySQL for PCF v2.2 enables operators to meet application uptime needs with its multi-availability zone (AZ), leader-follower plans. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/introducing-mysql-for-pcf-v2-2-leader-follower-clusters-offer-enhanced-availability?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/security-shifts-left-ep-59?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Security Shifts Left (Ep. 59) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Surag Patel, chief security officer at Contrast Security, joins Jeff and Dormain talk about integrating security into the software development process. Find out how shifting security left results in faster releases, lower costs, and more secure software. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/security-shifts-left-ep-59?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://youtu.be/5U_nTg5nkiQ]]> Raytheon's Digital Transformation Journey Raytheon is on a digital transformation journey that requires cultural shifts, regulatory considerations and new approaches toward driving regulatory compliance. Learn about their experiences and lessons learned in this SpringOne talk. Check it Out <[[https://youtu.be/5U_nTg5nkiQ]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-podcasts/beyond-stateless-devops-databases-robert-reeves-of-datical-ep-95?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Beyond Stateless—DevOps & Databases, Robert Reeves of Datical (Ep. 95) In this episode, Datical's CTO, Robert Reeves, discusses managing and including backing databases in the build pipeline and more. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-podcasts/beyond-stateless-devops-databases-robert-reeves-of-datical-ep-95?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 3/13-3/14 Spring Days, Boston <[[https://springdays.io/2018/boston]]>
4/17-4/20 Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf US, Jersey City <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/]]>
4/18-4/20 Cloud Foundry Summit North America, Boston <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
